description:
The #1 rated iPhone and iPad navigation solution.

#1 MotionX-GPS Drive named "Best iPhone App for Drivers" by Total Car Score

#1 "Hands-down my favorite navigator for the iPhone" -Andy Ihnatko, Chicago Sun-Times

#1 "My favorite is MotionX GPS Drive." - Dave Caolo, The Unofficial Apple Weblog (TUAW)

#1 "packed with features..." -Walt Mossberg, The Wall Street Journal

#1 "Hands-Down the best value in GPS Apps" -Gizmodo.com

#1 About.com Readers' Choice Award Winner: Best Auto Navigation App

LIMITED TIME OFFER: One year of Voice Guidance now 60% off!
____________________________________ 
The Best and Easiest Driving GPS, Always Live, Always Up-to-Date

For less than $1 per month: 
• Map data is always up-to-date 
• Real-time and predictive traffic-based routing and guidance
• Best INRIX traffic with free live traffic flow maps 
• Community contributed road alerts and reporting for accidents, hazards, police location, weather, and more
• Visual lane assistance for complex intersections and freeway junctions
• Live local speed limits displayed with the car's actual speed
• Multi-stop planning and routing
• Pre-load maps for offline use
• Use AirDrop for iOS 7 to share your destination with friends
• Multiple voice choices including fun options and HD synthesized voices
• Facebook and Twitter integration
• Local Search and Wikipedia integration for rich and up-to-date content
• Urban route planning with pedestrian navigation
• Full support for portrait and landscape mode 
• Parking spot marker
• Live compass
• Fast easy download from your iPhone or iPad! 

Complete U.S. and Canada Coverage. 
____________________________________ 
Includes 30 Days of free Real-time Turn-by-Turn Navigation with Live Voice Guidance and live INRIX traffic 

• After the 30 day period, continue using real-time navigation any time by making an in-app purchase. Choose either 30-days or 1-year.
• Access purchases on multiple iPhones or iPads for households with multiple users
• In-app purchases are non-recurring with no automatic charges

Live Voice Guidance gives you: 
• Real-time turn-by-turn voice guidance with high-quality spoken street names, fully integrated with the iPhone music player
• Live over-the-air maps and real-time navigation
• Cached routes and maps for optimal performance
• Predictive live traffic for optimal routing
• Details about traffic incidents, construction, and events

Please note the core application provides a great driving experience without any further purchase, including full access to search, routing, 3D maps, pedestrian navigation, and community contributed road alerts.
___________________________________ 

MotionX uses the latest TomTom maps, Apple search, and live predictive traffic information from INRIX to deliver the most complete navigation solution designed exclusively for the iPhone. 

MotionX-GPS Drive is compatible with the iPhone and iPad Wi-Fi + Cellular models. iPod touch and iPad models without cellular/GPS capability require an external GPS receiver. 

Continued use of any GPS service running in the background can significantly decrease battery life. 
____________________________________ 
MotionX is committed to passing on to our customers the best possible pricing for guidance services and turn-by-turn routing. We ourselves must pay the Map and traffic suppliers and therefore must charge a minimum fee for this service. We focus on providing the best value for quality information. 

MotionX is committed to constant improvement. We listen to our users and continuously add the most requested features.
